description: Tattooed, muscular Vadim Black and ripped stud Jaxx Thanatos both have their eyes on the same guy, thanks to a dating app, chiseled Diego Sans. They decide to let him choose who he wants to date, and invite him over for a test run. Hairy-chested Diego can’t pick between the two, and instead offers them both the chance to show him the goods. title: 2 Bottoms, 1 Top
